def has_remote_control(dvd_player:item):
    # Function to check if there is a remote control for the DVD player
    symbol has_remote=exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote) and close(remote, dvd_player)
    return has_remote

behavior use_remote_to_turn_on(dvd_player:item, remote:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Use remote to turn on the DVD player

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Select the DVD player
        if has_remote_control(dvd_player):
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and close(remote, dvd_player)
            # Select the remote control near the DVD player
            use_remote_to_turn_on(dvd_player, remote)
            # Use the remote to turn on the DVD player
        else:
            foreach remote: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
                    observe(remote, "Check if it is near the DVD player")
                    # Observe if the remote is close to the DVD player

def is_remote_near_dvd(remote:item, dvd:item):
    # Function to check if the remote is close to the DVD player
    symbol is_near=close(remote, dvd)
    return is_near

behavior move_remote_near_dvd(remote:item, dvd:item):
    body:
        if not is_remote_near_dvd(remote, dvd):
            # Move the remote closer to the DVD player if its not already near
            achieve close(remote, dvd)

behavior turn_on_dvd_with_remote(remote:item, dvd:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(dvd) # Turn the DVD player on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and id[remote]==2052
        # Select the remote control with the specified ID
        bind dvd: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd)
        # Select the DVD player

        if not visited(remote):
            # If the remote hasnt been observed yet, check its environment
            observe(remote, "Check if it is near the DVD player")

        move_remote_near_dvd(remote, dvd)
        turn_on_dvd_with_remote(remote, dvd)

behavior check_proximity(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        observe(remote_control, "Check if the remote control is close to the DVD player")

behavior move_remote(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close(remote_control, dvd_player)

behavior turn_on_dvd(dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and plugged(dvd_player)
        
        check_proximity(remote_control, dvd_player)
        
        if not close(remote_control, dvd_player):
            move_remote(remote_control, dvd_player)
        
        turn_on_dvd(dvd_player)
